quotes.message: Allow yourself to be inspired. Allow yourself to succeed. Dare to excel.
quotes.name: Vince Dente

quotes.message: You may not know where you're going, but so long as you spread your wings the winds will carry you.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
quotes.name: Jonas Salk

quotes.message: He that cannot reason is a fool. He that will not is a bigot. He that dare not is a slave.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Don't dare to be different, dare to be yourself - if that doesn't make you different then something is wrong.
quotes.name: Laura Baker

quotes.message: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.name: T. S. Eliot

quotes.message: A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free.
quotes.name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.message: Dare to err and to dream. Deep meaning often lies in childish plays.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
quotes.name: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.message: It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle.
quotes.name: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.message: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: He who knows how to suffer everything can dare everything.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: Dare to be true. Nothing can need a lie: a fault which needs it most, grows two thereby.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Everything you dare in life reveals the giant in you.
quotes.name: Topsy Gift

quotes.message: In order to conquer, what we need is to dare, still to dare, and always to dare.
quotes.name: Georges Danton

quotes.message: What a man dares to do, he should dare to confess- unless he is a coward.
quotes.name: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.message: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert Kennedy

quotes.message: Dare to wear the foolish clown face.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: We must dare, and dare again, and go on daring.
quotes.name: Georges Jacques Danton

quotes.message: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The only dare you ever want to take is the dare to be all that you can be.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: We become strong by embracing vulnerability, we dare more greatly when we acknowledge our fear.
quotes.name: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.message: You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.
quotes.name: Charles C. Noble

quotes.message: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
quotes.name: Billy Wilder

quotes.message: To dare to dream in the midst of adversity, in the midst of failure, in the midst of complacency, is to have hope.
quotes.name: Dani Johnson

quotes.message: We no longer dare to believe in beauty and we make of it a mere appearance in order the more easily to dispose of it.
quotes.name: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.message: Don't dare a person who has nothing else left to lose.
quotes.name: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.message: Dare to be the best you can at all times, dare to be!
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbours will say.
quotes.name: Cyril Connolly

quotes.message: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
quotes.name: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.message: Dare to be honest and fear no labor.
quotes.name: Robert Burns
